province of this committee. A recommendation was suggested that future conferences
be held in a campus situation to avoid distraction.
General conclusions of the General Meeting on recommendations by the Activi¬
ties Committee and suggestions from the floor:
1. The next conference will be held in Syracuse, New York,
2. The regional network committee was approved,
3. Kendall Crane was asked to follow up and circulate information to the region
members on his question, nAre any tapes (Empire State) available outside
the state of New York?”
4. There should be a study committee for the exchange or cataloging of kines
(to be named by Region I Director).
5. A study committee for the development of Region I will be formed after
the situation is first looked over by George Sloane. This grew from the
suggestion of Professor Phillips that there should be a concerted drive
for increased membership done throughout the area, expecially in Connecti¬
cut, on an individual level—urging that other institutions become members
of NAEB.
